sent.orig: Energize is formed from energy by analogy with apologize from aplogy.
sent.trans: Energize由energy 演变构成，以此类推，apologize 则由apology演变构成。

sent.orig: Energize is formed from energy the same way that apologize is formed from apology.
sent.trans: Energize由energy演变构成，以此类推，apologize则由apology演变构成。

sent.orig: Rex: Well, first, I want to apologize.
sent.trans: 雷克斯：好吧，首先，我向大家道歉。

sent.orig: Simon Adams: apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you.
sent.trans: 西蒙？亚当斯：很抱歉，给您带来了不便。

sent.orig: He craved to apologize to HIM, for he couldn't convey his ture feelings in words.
sent.trans: 少年急切地想和他道歉，因对他而言，很难以言语表达他的感情。
